thread.title: Jacob Scott

author: Jacob Scott
title: Jacob Scott
text:
I was trying to find a cold air intake and Amanda and by assisting me she secured my order for the purchase I was mistaken in the sense that the item had free shipping and she assured me that it wasn't the correct item and it did not have free shipping I just want to say thank you for the great customer service provided by Amanda as well as car ID in general I will be a returning customer in the future and is satisfied one as well
Thank you Amanda üòÅ
Best regards,
Jacob Scott
